entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json #53679
  • In RCL, how to deploy reusable .scss files using nuget in .NET Blazor project instead of npm while can be referenced (using @import) by other .scss within project folder? #53682
  • Improve Error Message and/or Docs around InvariantGlobalization true by default #53678
  • [Blazor] IJSRuntime.InvokeVoidAsync is accessing the wrong DOM in the browser #53677
  • Support passing float[] (Single[]) to JS from .NET via [JSImport] #53676
  • Kessler Windows Auth is not prompting UN/PW challenge on macOS, when server runs on windows AD. #53675
  • no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #53671
  • Provide common IHealthCheckPublisher implementation #53670

Closed

  • Interactive component looses state on Navigate to same page #52356
    Discussions
  • Blazor needs a "Angualr Hydration" similiar feature #53635
  • InteractiveServer StateHasChanged not firing but works with InteractiveWebAssembly #53662
  • Perf improvement: https #53666

PullRequests

Created

  • Return unsuccessful when trying to read form and request does not have body. Fixes #53630 #53680
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Remove deprecated VS Code extension #53673
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove comment about DotNet-Blob-Feed from ci.yml #53672
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Added InternalServerError and InternalServerError<TValue> to TypedResults #53656
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix XML docs in EndpointFilterInvocationContext.cs #53655
    community-contribution, area-networking
